mcpConfig.title: MCP Configuration Management
mcpConfig.selectServerHint: Please select an MCP server on the left or click to create a new MCP configuration
mcpConfig.configJsonPlaceholder: Please enter or paste the JSON content of the MCP configuration...
mcpConfig.invalidArgs: Invalid args field for {serverId}, must be a string array
mcpConfig.invalidArgsType: args[{index}] for {serverId} must be a string
mcpConfig.invalidEnv: Invalid env field for {serverId}, must be an object or empty array
mcpConfig.invalidEnvType: env[{key}] for {serverId} must be a string
mcpConfig.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this MCP server configuration? This action cannot be undone.
mcpConfig.deleteWarningText: This action cannot be undone. Please proceed with caution.
mcpConfig.argsFormatError: Args format error, please enter a valid JSON array
mcpConfig.envFormatError: Env format error, please enter a valid JSON object
mcpConfig.argsStringError: Args format error, each parameter must be a string
mcpConfig.envStringError: Env format error, each value must be a string
mcpConfig.missingUrlField: Missing url field: {serverId} - must have url or baseUrl when no command
mcpConfig.urlFieldTip: üí° Please provide url or baseUrl field
mcpConfig.serverConfigWarning: Server {serverId} has no command but also no url or baseUrl
mcpConfig.jsonSyntaxError: ‚ùå JSON syntax error - please check brackets, commas, quotes and other symbols
mcpConfig.jsonIncomplete: ‚ùå JSON incomplete - please check if ending brackets or quotes are missing
mcpConfig.jsonNumberError: ‚ùå JSON number format error - please check number format
mcpConfig.jsonStringError: ‚ùå JSON string format error - please check if quotes are paired
mcpConfig.argsPlaceholder:
One parameter per line, e.g.:
--from
mysql_mcp_server_pro
--mode
stdio
mcpConfig.envPlaceholder:
Key-value format, one per line, e.g.:
MYSQL_HOST:127.0.0.1
MYSQL_PORT:3306
MYSQL_USER:root
